meanings.definition: A one-piece outer garment for protecting the body from cold weather, typically made of waterproof material and designed for use in snowy conditions.
meanings.sent1: The child wore a cozy snowsuit to play in the snow.
meanings.sent2: During winter, it is important to wear a snowsuit to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to put on a tiny snowsuit, but it was too big for him.
meanings.sent4: Her white snowsuit blended perfectly with the snowy landscape.
meanings.sent5: The bright red snowsuit stood out against the white snow.
